docs.snippet: Venezuelan coach Cesar Farias, who steered his country to an unprecedented fourth place at the 2011 Copa America and on the brink of 2014 World Cup qualification, has lost his job at Tijuana.
docs.lead_paragraph: Venezuelan coach Cesar Farias, who steered his country to an unprecedented fourth place at the 2011 Copa America and on the brink of 2014 World Cup qualification, has lost his job at Tijuana.

headline.main: Venezuelan Coach Farias Loses Tijuana Job
headline.print_headline: Venezuelan Coach Farias Loses Tijuana Job

docs.snippet: Hull City made a triple swoop on transfer-deadline day by signing Uruguay pair Abel Hernandez and Gaston Ramirez and Senegal captain Mohamed Diame, the English Premier League club said on Monday.

docs.snippet: A plan to resettle six men held at the U.S. Navy base in Guantanamo in Uruguay is still being negotiated and is unlikely to occur before upcoming elections in the South American country, an official said Monday.
docs.lead_paragraph: A plan to resettle six men held at the U.S. Navy base in Guantanamo in Uruguay is still being negotiated and is unlikely to occur before upcoming elections in the South American country, an official said Monday.

headline.main: Uruguay: Guantanamo Prisoner Transfer Not Imminent
headline.print_headline: Uruguay: Guantanamo Prisoner Transfer Not Imminent

docs.snippet: Sunderland have signed Uruguay defender Sebastian Coates from Liverpool on a season-long loan, the Premier League club said in a statement on Monday.

docs.snippet: Manchester United dominated Europe's transfer activity as the transfer deadline window slammed shut on Monday, manager Louis van Gaal taking his summer spending spree to more than 150 million pounds.

docs.snippet: The transfer of six prisoners from the U.S. military prison at Guantanamo Bay to Uruguay is unlikely to take place before presidential elections are held in October, a senior Uruguayan official said on Monday.
docs.lead_paragraph: The transfer of six prisoners from the U.S. military prison at Guantanamo Bay to Uruguay is unlikely to take place before presidential elections are held in October, a senior Uruguayan official said on Monday.

headline.main: Guantanamo Detainee Transfer to Uruguay Unlikely Before Vote: Official
headline.print_headline: Guantanamo Detainee Transfer to Uruguay Unlikely Before Vote: Official

docs.snippet: Even though Spain were ousted in the first round of the World Cup, the tournament's brightest lights still flocked to La Liga as Real Madrid and Barcelona again flexed their financial muscles in a busy transfer window.

headline.main: La Liga Lure Proves Irresistible in Window

docs.snippet: Barcelona congratulated themselves on Tuesday for a job well done in the transfer window, while rivals Real Madrid were dealing with the fallout from Cristiano Ronaldo's apparent criticism of president Florentino Perez.

docs.snippet: For Manchester United, the answer to a slump in form or a crisis of confidence comes in 50 pound notes. Millions of them.

docs.snippet: Uruguayan President Jose Mujica is denying that he has been pressured by the United States to let six men being held at the U.S. Navy Base in Guantanamo, Cuba resettle in the South American country.
